fields.name: Berry's Potions of the Caribbean - Jeff Berry

fields.name: The Oxford Companion to Spirits and Cocktails - Wondrich & RothBaum

fields.name: The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks - David A. Embury

fields.name: Cocktail Techniques - Kazuo Uyeda
fields.description: Kazuo Uyeda's 'Cocktail Techniques' is a seminal work in the cocktail industry. Renowned for his precision and artistry, Uyeda shares his expertise in cocktail making, offering valuable insights into Japanese mixology.
fields.features: Author: Kazuo Uyeda, Japanese mixology techniques, In-depth cocktail craftsmanship, Elegant photography

fields.name: Bartenders Manual - Harry Johnson
fields.description: Harry Johnson's 'Bartenders Manual' is a seminal work in the world of bartending. First published in the late 19th century, it combines classic cocktail recipes with timeless wisdom and insights into the art of bartending.
fields.features: Author: Harry Johnson, Classic cocktail recipes, Timeless bartending wisdom, Historical insights

fields.name: American Bar - Frank P. Newman
fields.description: Frank P. Newman's 'American Bar' is a classic text that captures the essence of early 20th-century American bartending. The book is a treasure trove of cocktail recipes and bar management tips from one of the era's most celebrated bartenders.
fields.features: Author: Frank P. Newman, Early 20th-century cocktails, Bar management tips, Historical perspective

fields.name: Hoffman House Bartender's Guide - Charley Mahoney
fields.description: Charley Mahoney's 'Hoffman House Bartender's Guide' is an iconic guidebook from one of New York's most famous pre-Prohibition bars. It offers a fascinating glimpse into the golden age of American bartending, with classic recipes and timeless techniques.
fields.features: Author: Charley Mahoney, Pre-Prohibition era recipes, Insight into historical bartending techniques
